resources.string: Please select a new Category for the %1$d transactions currently in %2$s
Unfortunately you have already created the maximum number of %1$s allowed in the myCashFlow Free, which has the following limits:
Note that the Demo Scenario is pre-configured to exceed these limits. Be sure to try creating a new Scenario.
If you would like to upgrade to the full version of myCashFlow, please click the link below to visit Google Play and make your purchase.

string-array.name: main_descriptions
string-array.item: Configure categories to allow items to be categorised for reporting purposes
Choose a dark, light or light with dark header theme
